issue.title: Buildings in task 1 are saturated black and hill textures took a step backwards

content.raw:
I updated the models using gazebo_models 274:93636fa9a155 and the houses are fixed.  The mailboxes are still saturated black and the cones also appear to be too dark.

Unrelated side comment: Atlas fell immidiately and the new ground texture in the start area kinda looks like it might be a crime scene.
content.html:
I updated the models using gazebo_models 274:93636fa9a155 and the houses are fixed. The mailboxes are still saturated black and the cones also appear to be too dark.
